html:
2025-0815
2025-11-21AAFC, CFIAPlant Protection ActRegulations Amending the Plant Protection RegulationsRegulations Amending the Plant Protection Regulations in order to (1) consolidate the domestic movement prohibitions and restrictions into a single document incorporated by reference in the Regulation; (2) remove the requirement to automatically submit an original hard copy document when that same document has been submitted electronically; and (3) support a future electronic phytosanitary certification exchange system.Registration: SOR/2025-0236 Publication Date: 2025-12-03
subject: Regulations Amending the Plant Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Plant Protection Regulations in order to (1) consolidate the domestic movement prohibitions and restrictions into a single document incorporated by reference in the Regulation; (2) remove the requirement to automatically submit an original hard copy document when that same document has been submitted electronically; and (3) support a future electronic phytosanitary certification exchange system.
